root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_BUDG_BORR_RETURN AS SELECT A.GROUP_ID, --集团ID A.HOS_ID, --医院ID A.COPY_CODE, --账套编码 A.RETURN_CODE AS BUSINESS_ID,--借款返还单号 A.RETURN_CODE AS BUSINESS_NO,--借款返还单号 A.RETURN_DATE as busi_date,--申请日期 A.DEPT_ID, --科室ID A.DEPT_NO, --科室变更ID HDD.DEPT_CODE,--科室编码 HDD.DEPT_NAME,--科室名称 A.PROJ_ID, --项目ID A.PROJ_NO, --项目变更ID HPD.PROJ_CODE,--项目编码 HPD.PROJ_NAME,--项目名称 A.EMP_ID, --还款人ID A.EMP_NO, --还款人变更ID HED.EMP_CODE, --还款人编码 HED.EMP_NAME, --还款人名称 A.RETURN_AMOUNT AS AMOUNT_MONEY, --还款金额 A.MAKER, --制单人ID U1.USER_NAME MAKER_NAME, --制单人名称 A.MAKE_DATE, --编制日期 A.OPERATOR AS CONFIRMER, --入库确认人ID U2.USER_NAME AS CONFIRMER_NAME, --确认人 A.STATE, --状态 BSD.VALUE_NAME STATE_NAME, --状态名称 A.PAY_WAY AS SUB_TYPE_ID, --支付方式 APY.PAY_NAME , --支付方式名称 ATTR.OUT_CODE --科室支出性质 FROM BUDG_BORR_RETURN A LEFT JOIN HOS_DEPT_DICT HDD --科室 ON A.GROUP_ID = HDD.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = HDD.HOS_ID AND A.DEPT_ID = HDD.DEPT_ID AND A.DEPT_NO=HDD.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN ACC_DEPT_ATTR ATTR --科室属性 ON HDD.DEPT_ID=ATTR.DEPT_ID AND HDD.GROUP_ID=ATTR.GROUP_ID AND HDD.HOS_ID=ATTR.HOS_ID LEFT JOIN HOS_PROJ_DICT HPD ON A.GROUP_ID = HPD.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = HPD.HOS_ID AND A.PROJ_ID = HPD.PROJ_ID AND A.PROJ_NO = HPD.PROJ_NO LEFT JOIN HOS_EMP_DICT HED ON A.GROUP_ID = HED.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = HED.HOS_ID AND A.EMP_ID = HED.EMP_ID AND A.EMP_NO = HED.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_USER U1 --制单人 ON A.GROUP_ID = U1.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = U1.HOS_ID AND A.MAKER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER U2 --确认人 ON A.GROUP_ID = U2.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = U2.HOS_ID AND A.OPERATOR = U2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ACC_PAY_TYPE APY --支付方式 ON A.GROUP_ID = APY.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = APY.HOS_ID AND A.COPY_CODE = APY.COPY_CODE AND A.PAY_WAY = APY.PAY_CODE LEFT JOIN BUDG_SYS_DICT BSD --状态值 ON A.STATE = BSD.VALUE_CODE AND BSD.F_CODE = 'RUTURN_STATE' WHERE A.STATE = '02'

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_BUDG_BORR_RETURN_DET AS SELECT A.GROUP_ID,--集团ID A.HOS_ID, --医院ID A.COPY_CODE,--账套编码 A.RETURN_CODE AS BUSINESS_ID,--还款单号 A.RETURN_CODE AS BUSINESS_NO,--还款单号 A.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID||'-'||A.SOURCE_ID AS DETAIL_ID,--明细ID A.SOURCE_ID, --资金来源ID B.SOURCE_CODE, --资金来源编码 B.SOURCE_NAME, --资金来源名称 B.SOURCE_ATTR ,--资金来源性质 A.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID as SUB_TYPE_ID,--支出项目ID A.PAYMENT_ITEM_NO,--支出项目变更ID C.PAYMENT_ITEM_CODE,--支出项目编码 C.PAYMENT_ITEM_NAME,--支出项目名称 A.RETURN_AMOUNT AS AMOUNT_MONEY --金额 FROM BUDG_BORR_RETURN_DET A LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE B ON A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = B.HOS_ID AND A.SOURCE_ID = B.SOURCE_ID LEFT JOIN BUDG_PAYMENT_ITEM_DICT C ON A.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND A.HOS_ID = C.HOS_ID AND A.COPY_CODE = C.COPY_CODE AND A.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID = C.PAYMENT_ITEM_ID AND A.PAYMENT_ITEM_NO = C.PAYMENT_ITEM_NO AND C.IS_FRESH = 1
